com.foreach.across.modules.activitylog.domain.entry.ui.property

Interface PropertyValueBasedRegistrar

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BasePropertyValueBasedRegistrar, CollectionValueBasedPropertyRegistrar, DateValueBasedPropertyRegistrar, MapValueBasedPropertyRegistrar, StringValueBasedPropertyRegistrar

    public interface PropertyValueBasedRegistrar
    Registrar that supports creating properties based on a given Object.
    Since:
    0.0.1
    Author:
    Steven Gentens
    See Also:
    PropertyValueBasedRegistryProvider

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      com.foreach.across.modules.entity.registry.properties.MutableEntityPropertyDescriptor createPropertyDescriptor(com.foreach.across.modules.entity.registry.properties.MutableEntityPropertyDescriptor parentDescriptor, String propertyName, Object value, com.foreach.across.modules.entity.registry.properties.MutableEntityPropertyRegistry propertyRegistry)
      Creates a MutableEntityPropertyDescriptor for a given Object
      boolean handles(Object value)
      Checks whether this PropertyValueBasedRegistrar can create properties based on the given value.
      void registerMemberDescriptors(com.foreach.across.modules.entity.registry.properties.MutableEntityPropertyDescriptor valueDescriptor, Object value, com.foreach.across.modules.entity.registry.properties.MutableEntityPropertyRegistry propertyRegistry)
      Supports creating additional property descriptors after the creation of the descriptor for the given value.

    • Method Detail

      • handles

        boolean handles(Object value)
        Checks whether this PropertyValueBasedRegistrar can create properties based on the given value.
        Parameters:
        value - for which one or more property descriptors should be created.
        Returns:
        true if this registrar can handle the given property type.

      • createPropertyDescriptor

        com.foreach.across.modules.entity.registry.properties.MutableEntityPropertyDescriptor createPropertyDescriptor(com.foreach.across.modules.entity.registry.properties.MutableEntityPropertyDescriptor parentDescriptor,
                                                                                                               String propertyName,
                                                                                                               Object value,
                                                                                                               com.foreach.across.modules.entity.registry.properties.MutableEntityPropertyRegistry propertyRegistry)
        Creates a MutableEntityPropertyDescriptor for a given Object
        Parameters:
        parentDescriptor - parent descriptor for the property, for which for example the value can be retrieved.
        propertyName - of the new property that should be created
        value - that defines what the property looks like
        propertyRegistry - the property registry of the parent descriptor, in which this property descriptor will also be registered.
        Returns:
        a new MutableEntityPropertyDescriptor for the given property

      • registerMemberDescriptors

        void registerMemberDescriptors(com.foreach.across.modules.entity.registry.properties.MutableEntityPropertyDescriptor valueDescriptor,
                               Object value,
                               com.foreach.across.modules.entity.registry.properties.MutableEntityPropertyRegistry propertyRegistry)
        Supports creating additional property descriptors after the creation of the descriptor for the given value. Can be used for example to create nested property descriptors, or additional indexer / map descriptors.
        Parameters:
        valueDescriptor - that has just been created based on the given value
        value - for which additional descriptors could be registered
        propertyRegistry - registry in which the value descriptor has been registered.
